law.catch_line: A motor carrier shall pay to the Comptroller the motor carrier tax computed by multiplying the tax r...
law.text: A motor carrier shall pay to the Comptroller the motor carrier tax computed by multiplying the tax rate under § 9-204 of this subtitle by the gallons of motor fuel used, as computed under § 9-212 of this subtitle, less any credit allowed under § 9-214 of this subtitle.
